item.title: 10 Jenis Logo yang harus kamu ketahui
item.description: Artikel ini menghadirkan penjelasan yang komprehensif mengenai 10 jenis logo yang penting untuk diketahui dalam dunia desain grafis dan branding.

item.title: Kali Linux 2023.1 - The Ultimate Platform for Offensive and Defensive Security
item.description: A comprehensive overview of the latest version of Kali, covering its features, enhancements, and upgrades, to provide you with all the necessary knowledge about this version.

item.title: What’s The Difference Between Logo Design and Branding
item.description: There is a general perception that “logo design” and “branding” are the same thing. Sometimes these two terms are even used as synonyms. However, although they are closely related and must work together in a cohesive way, they are very different processes.
